Description: Angular wheelmade kaolinite cup in a typical Meroitic style with simple direct rim, straight walls and lower body angle towards recessed spot base. Covered in pale orange slip exterior and over rim interior, and decorated with a frieze demarcated by two black painted lines above and below; centre is filled with horizontal lotus flowers with three petals. The flowers alternate black and red with black outlines. Incompletely re-assembled from fragments.
